name: local-fe-assistant
description: Local frontend coding assistant (React + TS + Tailwind) with memory, powered by Ollama

scripts.llm:pull: docker exec fe-llm ollama pull qwen2.5-coder:3b && docker exec fe-llm ollama pull qwen2.5vl:3b
scripts.llm:wait: sh -c 'echo "[llm:wait] waiting for ollama models..."; until docker exec fe-llm ollama list | grep -q qwen2.5-coder:3b && docker exec fe-llm ollama list | grep -q qwen2.5vl:3b; do sleep 3; done; echo "[llm:wait] models ready"'
scripts.dev:stack: pnpm llm:up && pnpm llm:wait && pnpm dev

author: Ugi Ispoyo Widodo
